p: The previous data clearly demonstrate that 12c is an effective anti-mitotic quinoline compound in MCF-7 cell lines. Herein, the effect of 12c on the expression of apoptosis pathway markers, Bcl-2 anti-apoptotic protein and Bax pro-apoptotic protein was investigated. MCF-7 cells treated with 12c at 250 nM for 48 h decreased the expression level of the anti-apoptotic protein Bcl-2, and correspondingly up-regulated the expression of the pro-apoptotic protein Bax ( Figure 6(A,B)).
